705523f-a.text:
(1)
Lynch Street, west from Harrison Ave. At right foreground, is a view of the 47th Regiment headquarters of the N.Y. State Armory.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
Same, showing view on Marcy Ave. Corner stone laid in 1883.
October 1928.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

H2rrison Ave., east side, south from Lynch Street.
April 30, 1931.

705524f-a.text:
Lynch Street, south side, between Harrison Street and Broadway. In the foreground, buildings have been razed to make way for the Eighth Ave., Muni. cipal Subway. The rear vdew of the frame houses, are on Midcleton Street.
north side, between Harrison Street and Broadway.
March 24, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
